txt.en: Interlude: Last March of the Ents
The Ents have been driven mad by the fires of Saruman! His evil must be washed away!
Survey your handiwork and greet the newcomer

'That was a rousing march, Treebeard! We have come to the ring of Isengard sooner than I thought we would, and our business with the Wizard waits before us!'

Quickbeam peers at the hobbits clinging to your upper branches.

'Hold on, little ones! Keep a good grip, and do not fall!'
Saruman's servant has gone to join his master in the tower
Quickbeam must not be defeated
'DNT - Blah!'

'What has happened here? You... you have worked some mischief...'

The little man's eyes dart left and right, taking in as much of the devastation as he can.

'What has happened to Saruman? I... bore messages for him from the King, but it seems they are no longer necessary...'

He turns to go, but you stop him. It is plain he served the Wizard and was complicit in his designs. They deserve each other's company.
'Seize and grasp, hew the stone!'
'This way, Fangorn!'
'Look! The gate cannot stand against the might of the Ents!'
The Ents have come to Isengard to remind Saruman of the danger he has risked with his plans.
Saruman's servant has gone to join his master in the tower.
'Hoom, boom! The gate of Isengard could not hold us back!'
You have come to the ring of Isengard with as many of the Ents that responded to your call. The time has come to remind Saruman of what he has forgotten!
'We were positively... hoom-hom... hasty!'
The Ents have smashed open the gate to Isengard, and now you should proceed into the ring.
'Saruman had weapons of his own.'
'I will gather the rest of our people, Fangorn, while you press forward through the main gate into Isengard! I will meet up with you beyond the gate!'
DNT - Blah!
'Saruman fought with smoke and with fire.'
'We paid him back with water.'
DNT - Blah!
The Ents have torn down the gate that gives entrance to the Ring of Isengard.
'Not long after, one of his servants returned.'
Saruman has fought back with flame and smoke!
Talk to Quickbeam outside the ring of Isengard
'I set a watch upon the tower.'
The Ents have diverted the river and flooded the Ring of Isengard. Their purpose: to wash it clean of Saruman's filth.
'Saruman will work no further harm.'
Protect Quickbeam and the other Ents from Saruman's forces
Talk to Quickbeam in front of the gate to Isengard
Pass through the ruined gate of Isengard and defeat Saruman's forces
'This way! We will smash the Wizard's walls!'
'Strike the wall, my friends! Fangorn and I will keep you undamaged!'
'Saruman does not know we approach. He will learn it soon!'
'Saruman's army has departed, but some Orcs remain.'
'Saruman's supply of Orcs runs low!'
'Hoom, boom, bring it down!'
'Yes, yes!'
'This way, Fangorn!'
'Bring it down!'
'Get back! Get away from me!'
'But... but I cannot swim!'
'Oh! It's cold!'
Quickbeam has fallen!
